channel.title: Posts on Shuent

item.title: Auto deploy Test
item.description: Shファイルを使ってデプロイスクリプトを使う。 #!/bin/bash echo -e "\033[0;32mDeploying updates to GitHub...\033[0m" # Build the project. hugo # if using a theme, replace with `hugo -t <YOURTHEME>` # Go To Public folder cd public # Add changes to git. git add . # Commit changes. msg="rebuilding site `date`" if [ $# -eq 1 ] then msg="$1" fi git commit -m "$msg" # Push source and build repos. git push origin master # Come Back up to the Project Root cd .
